title: The land degradation and desertification-socioeconomic nexus in Egypt's delta region: A case study on Alexandria and Beheira
content:
Publication date: 30 May 2024

Source: Heliyon, Volume 10, Issue 10

Author(s): Maha Elhini, Hoda Hassaballa, Nicholas P. Simpson, Maha Balbaa, Remah Ibrahim, Sameh Mansour, Mohamed E. Abou-Kota, Shimaa Ganzour
